bug.author: davidSedlacek
bug.summary: Assets - 0.7.1 - national chars in file names
bug.description: Hello all, please, consider renaming of following files in Asset archive ( version 0.7.1: 1gf3YaFIjwr1EaK6qxq2V-a510Brt9Imq ). Unreal cant finds them thanks to national settings on some windows systems. Failed to load /Game/Static/Vegetation/Billboard/Sin_título-4.Sin_título-4 Failed to load /Game/Static/Vegetation/Newtrees/Cherry_Bark_écorce-du-port-greffe.Cherry_Bark_écorce-du-port-greffe Failed to load /Game/Static/Vegetation/Newtrees/veg_bush_pinebush_v001/Cherry_Bark_écorce-du-port-greffe_NRM.Cherry_Bark_écorce-du-port-greffe_NRM thanks david

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/davidSedlacek>@davidSedlacek</denchmark-link>
Thanks for pointing us to this issue. We use generators for some assets and some of them create files with Illegal characters, so sometimes is hard to follow all of this files. We'll be correcting them right away.
